attributes.name: Divine
attributes.parsed_description: You gain 5.0% more health from all incoming healing effects.
You gain 7.4% more health from all incoming healing effects.

attributes.name: Stamina Recovery
attributes.parsed_description: When you are hit while below 50% gain 50.0 stamina (30.0s cooldown.) Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.
When you are hit while below 50% gain 73.6 stamina (44.2s cooldown.) Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.

attributes.name: Freedom
attributes.parsed_description: Slow, Stun, and Silence expires -3.0% faster.
Slow, Stun, and Silence expires -4.3% faster.
You gain 8.6% more health from all incoming healing effects.

attributes.name: Resilient
attributes.parsed_description: Critical hits deal 3.0% less damage to you.
Critical hits deal 4.7% less damage to you.

attributes.name: Healthy Toast
attributes.parsed_description: When you drink a mana potion gain 3.0% of your max health.
When you drink a mana potion gain 9.4% of your max health.

attributes.name: Evasive
attributes.parsed_description: Reduce the generation of threat by -50% for 5 seconds after performing a dodge.
Reduce the generation of threat by -50% for 5 seconds after performing a dodge.

attributes.name: Luck
attributes.parsed_description: +0.5% chance at rare items from chests and monsters.
+2.1% chance at rare items from chests and monsters.
